title: Fitness Sales Manager - Merced - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-24-2015 Brief Job Description: Contribute to the profitability of clubs by driving Personal Training sales and Member Satisfaction through the execution of standardized production methods.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
